rows.label: tlk70000026_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Laura-sama, please allow me to offer my
congratulations!

rows.label: tlk70000026_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It was such a beautiful ceremony.
It brought tears to my eyes, truly!

rows.label: tlk70000026_04_msg0003
rows.name:
For the first time, I've been inspired to
try to capture the wonderful moment
in glass, as a memento.

rows.label: tlk70000026_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm going to give this piece my all. Will
you come back and see it once it's
done?
